trans-unit.source: When you use a Microsoft Azure Traffic Manager to load balance traffic to your Azure Website, that website can then be accessed using the \*.trafficmanager.net domain name assigned by Azure.
trans-unit.target: When you use a Microsoft Azure Traffic Manager to load balance traffic to your Azure Website, that website can then be accessed using the \*.trafficmanager.net domain name assigned by Azure.

trans-unit.source: You can also associate a custom domain name, such as www.contoso.com, with your website in order to provide a more recognizable domain name for your users.
trans-unit.target: You can also associate a custom domain name, such as www.contoso.com, with your website in order to provide a more recognizable domain name for your users.
